items.title: Dunkin’ Donuts: Personalization at Scale
items.desc: We created a highly personalized and elevated service experience for Dunkin Donuts customers. Through DD Perks- Dunkin’s loyalty program, we developed a proprietary segmentation of nine distinct customer segments each defined by brand attitudes, product preferences and profitability. We then developed irresistible "offer" strategies by launching cross channel creative, and each moment was optimized through email, app, site, and social.
